channel.title: LCF data structure reference on EasyRPG Wiki
channel.description: Recent content in LCF data structure reference on EasyRPG Wiki

item.title: Audio Information
item.description: Sound Data Type: 1 Dimensional Array Index Detail Data Type Default Value etc. 1 File Name String "" 3 Volume Integer 100 0(silence) 〜 100(max) 4 Tempo Integer 100 50 ≦ 100(normal) ≦ 150 5 Balance Integer 50 0(left) ≦ 50(center) ≦ 100(right) Music Data Type: 1 Dimensional Array Index Detail Data Type Default Value etc.

item.title: data-types
item.description: Integer Boolean Double String Event Command Array 1 Dimensional Array 2 Dimensional Array Binary BER Number Enumeration Reference table |Index|Detail|Data Type|Default Value|etc.| |* Index in array.| |Default Value of Element. | Decimal number.|* Some Description of Element.|* Data Type of Element. mostly “Integer” or “Boolean” has this. If blank it must not be undefined|* Note of this Element.* “Binary” type will always have this.|

item.title: LcfMapTree
item.description: File Name “RPG_RT.lmt” “lmt” stands for “Lcf” “Map” “Tree” Header “LcfMapTree” Global Array Data Type: 2 Dimensional Array [0]: Root. This “map name” is the game title. BER Number Enumeration Element Number(BER) + BER Number[Element Number * 1] Start Point Data Type: 1 Dimensional Array Index Detail Data Type Default Value etc. 1 Party Map ID Integer 2 Party X Coordinate Integer 0 3 Party Y Coordinate Integer 0 11 Boat Map ID Integer 12 Boat X Coordinate Integer 0 13 Boat Y Coordinate Integer 0 21 Ship Map ID Integer 22 Ship X Coordinate Integer 0 23 Ship Y Coordinate Integer 0 31 Airship Map ID Integer 32 Airship X Coordinate Integer 0 33 Airship Y Coordinate Integer 0
